verses.name: Isaiah 63:12
verses.text: That led them by the right hand of Moses with his glorious arm, dividing the water before them, to make himself an everlasting name?

verses.name: Isaiah 63:13
verses.text: That led them through the deep, as an horse in the wilderness, that they should not stumble?

verses.name: Isaiah 63:14
verses.text: As a beast goeth down into the valley, the Spirit of the Lord caused him to rest: so didst thou lead thy people, to make thyself a glorious name.
